Key Match Events: Guinea took an unexpected lead just 10 minutes in
Francois Kamano was sent off for a nasty challenge
Frank Magri headed in the equalizing goal five minutes into the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cameroon failed to clear the danger after a shot was saved
Cameroon kept the ball in Guinea's half for the rest of the game but could not find a way through
Others: Guinea were reduced to 10 men in the first half
Although Cameroon kept the ball in Guinea's half for the rest of the game, they could not find a way through until the 88th minute
Cameroon struggled to create many clear-cut chances
10-man Guinea struggled to get forward and were unable to register a single shot in the last 45 minutes
